items.sentence: I\'m beginning to understand why Tom loves Boston.
I just want to tell Tom before somebody else does.
I just want you to think about me once in a while.
I like to spread honey on my toast in the morning.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve seen my family.
It\'s all right, Tom. Everything\'s all right now.
I\'ve been trying to solve this problem for hours.
I\'ve been very busy since I returned from abroad.
I\'ve got two hours to finish writing this report.
Tom wasn\'t satisfied with the pay he was getting.
